title: creation of a scheduled task
extract: Under the actions panel, you can choose to create a back task or create a task. Click “Create Task“. In the “Name” field, give the task a name. ... The last section is the “Security options“, here you can set who can run this task and if the task has admin right.Aug 1, 2018
extract_html: Under the actions panel, you can choose to create a back task or create a task. Click “Create Task“. In the “Name” field, give the task a name. ... The last section is the “Security options“, here you can set who can run this task and if the task has admin right.Aug 1, 2018
